p: Turnip leaf extract significantly decreased serum glucose and prevented the elevation of plasma ALT in a dose-dependent manner. This activity may be due to the possession of high levels of polyphenolic compounds and the presence of flavonoids and tannins. Therefore, turnip leaf chemical components may have exerted a regenerative effect on Î²-cells and stimulated these cells to produce more insulin, or have contained some insulin-like substances [ 195].
